documents.document:
Those Get Famous From "Gossip Girl"

<p>From the perspective of fashion, the influence of "Gossip Girl" on the adolescents is like that of "Sex and City" on women. The dramatic critics of "The New York Times" even argued that "Gossip Girl" represented the new generation of women after that of "Sex and City", showing its far-reaching influnce. With every episode broadcasting, there were full of questions, for example, what clothes Serena( the name of the female leading role in the play) worn in the play under discussion, and more and more online shops began to make use of the clothes in the play to promote their commodities.Wardrobe Essentials for Love</p><p>Serena's dress with golden sequins was asked most frequently. It was designed by Tory Burch with the price of $750, which has been sold out. Another female leading role Blair's boots - Max Studio, of course, also has been sold out. The scarf--J.press Chuck wearing appeared frequently in the play has led to a tide of rushing to buy. Besides, Blair's heart-shaped necklace -Tiffany, and the sexy, sweat pajamas--Victoria's Secret have become popular goods.Iâ€™ll Have What Katy Perry Having: GHD Hair Straighteners </p><p>Different from the brightly colored noble academism, "Gossip Girl" as a whole creates and leads the decadent academism, which extends and deepens the Preppy fashion raised by designer Marc Jacbos. Styles of clothes are derived from the traditional life styles of English and American high society: outing, picnic, horse riding, lawn tennis, golf, yacht out to sea and noble schools which are set in suburbs. It represents real rich life,leisure and good taste and shows the simple ,clean and elegant dress style ,but with a little decadence.</p><p>A group of growing children are dispensing the past but troubled by the future, so decadence exactly meets their needs. They pursue high-quaility life, and are eager to freedom but keep the traditional appreciation of the beauty. Therefore, scarves, pearl necklaces, headbands and other accessories become indispensable in the girl's modeling, while boys often match a conservative suit with a Polo shirt.</p><p>The popularity of the TV shows also makes a gong of people famous who are off stage.And the most striking one of them is Eric Daman. Being a fashion assistant of Patricia Field in the Sex and The City and taking home the Emmy, he finnaly gained a big break because of Gossip Girl. He also cooperate with Old Navy to teach him how to match prince and princess from uptown eastern on the official line of play.</p><p>Fashion designer Abigail Lorick who is younger also becomes popular. She used to be a model who actually even failed to find enough money to attend the New York Fashion Week prior to "Gossip Girl". Lucky, as good friend of Eric, she provided her first series clothes to crew, so, audiences saw a specialty episode’s plot, which is taking photos for fashion magazines. Then Abigail is famous.</p><p>The actors also caught on fame. With no exception, they all got favored by the media. A crowd of young actors born after 1985 occupied the covers of the most famous fashion magzines with their young faces and bodies.i Of course, when we get down to think about it, fashion is a synonym to terrible temptaion. It is not guilty of being superficial, but guilty of being able to mislead the value of its pursuers. We have to say that fashion circle has never just sold clothes but that kind of fetishism and vanity.</p><p>American literary critic Carol Plau Liebau thinks, some women is indeed easy to go wrong because of this TV drama--makes “sexy is more important than character or wisdom” charm and normalize seriously.</p>

The Popular Basketball Player Became The Hottest Topic An

<p>"Orlando Sentinel" message, NBA's oldest referee Dick Bavetta claims that he would retire after this season after the game between the Magic and the Thunder today. Gifts of GHD Straighteners for Under $10069 years old, he is to leave the NBA arena that he has been working for 32 years. Megastar Give You Effective Ways to Buy ghd straighteners uk Cavaliers to give up signing Daniels: Prior to this, the Cavaliers could not confirm when West would rejoin, and they were not sure what help they could get from Gibson.What to Choose for 30s? GHD Straighteners UK !</p><p>Therefore, when Daniels has just abandoned by the original team, the Cavaliers were close to sign him to complete the defensive line. However, with the Wister's early return, as well as the team striker Gibson's comeback, Cleveland Cavaliers think that there is no need for them to add new players on the defensive line, so according to the latest news, Knight has given up the signing of Daniels.</p><p>Fears are heard about that Gordon may be absent in the match with the Hornets Team due to his injuries according to the report from the Los Angeles local media. Eric – Gordon, nicknamed as Clippers second-year guard, whose pains are felt about in the left groin, is possible to be absence from the match with the Hornets Team. Eric-Gordon is the 7th of the first round rookie the Clippers chose in 2008, last season, with averaging 16.1 points, 2.6 reoounds, 2.8 assists and 1 steals. This season, he got averaging 18.9 pointa, 3.3 rebounds and 4.0 assists for the team. The king has been the number one topic in New York. According to the reports of "Los Angeles Times", When James is going to lead the Cavaliers to visit the Madison Square Garden of Knicks in New York,</p> <p>The focus of people's attention has been shifted from the results of the match, what comes to the spotlight is if the advent of James in 2010 is possible. In the game against the Nicks, many fans had been holding a special New York jersey and waited in the sidelines, the back side of the jersey was printed with James and 23 and other words.</p><p>What's more, the image of James wearing a New York jersey also came to the huge posters, and countdown even began to welcome the coming of James to New York. In addition to the basketball funs, some superstar in the entertainment circle also came to Madison Square Garden to see his performance, unwilling to miss such a golden opportunity. The little king had completely taken the place as his own home ground. It is no exaggeration to tell you that people on the streets of New York are all talking about James. Atai is difficult to replace Ariza: This summer, the Lakers did not do its best to retain Ariza, but introduced Ron Artest from Houston Rockets rapidly.</p><p> Today, the magazine "World of Basket" published an article noting that the Lakers might regret for its decision at last. In the absence of Yao Ming and Tracy McGrady, the Rockets got an admirable record, with the excellent performance of Ariza as an important reason. In Lakers, Ariza knew his role at the court and of great helpful to winning Ron Artest hadn't prove himself from the highest stage of the Union yet. Do not forget, and Trevor Ariza is only 24 years old, while Ron Artest is soon 30 years old. If the Lakers can defend successfully in June next year, so happy, regardless, what will happento Rockets this season.</p><p>However,if the Lakers' championship is occupied by other teams, but Areza played his best season of his career, it is estimated Mitch Kupchak's decision to introduce Artest would be accused by many people.</p>

International Community Pledges International Community Pled

<p>A 7. Luxury Mistakes Even Smart Jessica Biel Make with ghd uk 0 magnitude earthquake struck Haiti, a country on the Caribbean island, at local time 4:53 pm of January 12th, 2010, and its capital Port-au-Prince and most areas of the country affected are in serious condition. Fairy ghd uk are One of Latest Direction of Fashion Throughout the World Haiti's presidential palace and some government-department buildings were damaged in the earthquake occured on 12, but President René Préval and his wife remained unharmed. 5 Principles You should Break The Haiti's prime minister Jean Max Bellerive claimed on 13rd that the death toll in the quake might be as many as 100 thousand. By January 19, 2010, it has estimated that the death toll might has surpassed 200 thousand.</p><p>The earthquake caused collapse of local buildings, beneath ruins of which many people were buried. And roads were blocked by the ruins of buildings, and some people beneath the ruins have died. There were dozens of dead and injured people in the rubble, and all the things began to shake, people screaed, "God" and scattered around, and houses began to collapse, the city chaos.</p><p>Before long the 7.0 earthquake occurred, Haiti had occurred 5.9 magnitude and 5.5 magnitude earthquakes. The United Nations peacekeeping force headquarters in Haiti were destroyed in the earthquake. After the earthquake, many countries lent hands to Haiti, claiming to offer humanitarian aid with 10 million dollars for emergency. U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon released a statement saying he is very concerned with Haiti residents, UN workers and the change of the situation. He has decided to send the assistant Secretary-General, the ex-principal of the UN peacekeeping force Edmond Mulet to leave for Haiti. He himself would visit Haiti as soon as possible.</p><p>The world bank has asked a disaster condition assessment group to go there which would be responsible for the estimation of the damage and assissting to work out the rebuilding plan. The World Bank also said that they will send relief goods to Haiti urgently. Moreoever, it said that Haiti has 3.8 million interest-free loan from the World Bank, accounting for 4 percent of its total foreign debts. In view of the crisis to Haiti brought by the earthquake, World Bank decided to waive the loans in accordance with the terms of the repayment of capital in the next five years, and made commitment to cancel the remaining debts.</p><p>The European Commission has also decided to provide 3 million Euros for emergency to aid earthquake victims in Haiti, and they will provide the follow-up assistance after the further disaster assessment in Haiti. In addition, WFP also offered foods like high-energy biscuit that does not need cook on earthquake-stricken areas in Haiti. At the same time, WFP is also preparing for 200 million people’s grain ration in the next six months. Obama said that America was prepared to help Haiti. He shew concern over the people who sufferred the disaster and said he would continually focus on this matter. The report organized by doctors without borders said that at least two hospitals were in good condition, and their doctors will begin to prepare to sevive for about 500 people who needed emergency surgery.</p><p>Although the international communities lent their helping hand to Haiti, it still can not restore to those people’s lives that had been died in the earthquake. And such disaster occurred in Haiti was not the first time. Haiti locates in Island of Hispaniola, a seismically active area which has repeatedly experienced destructive earthquakes in history. One of them occurred in 1751, at that time the island of Hispaniola was still in the French colonial control.</p>

Canada's Sweetest Day: Maple Sugar Festival

<p>The Maple Syrup Festival from the end of the March to the begin of April is the Canadian traditional folk festival, When the spring coming in March, the farm which product maple sugar were burshed new, and put on the festival's topdress, they tasted the sweet present that the nature give them together. Seize the Time!! It Is Tasteful for You to Choose Outstanding GHD Hair Straighteners 3 New You Should Know</p><p>Canada abounds with maple leaf, in which the southeast Quebec province and Ontario are the most and ultima. The Maple tress are all over the Canada the maple leaf looked like sunset glow when came into late autumn, as if the flowers blooming in the summer, so the Canada was called the "country of maple leaf". In Canada people got deep affection with maple leaf, and took it as the symbol of the country, runs from large-scale national flag national emblem national flower to small pieces the daily life living goods of common people, the maple leaf pictures can be found everywhere, and enjoy popular support. The Canadian love the maple trees very much, not only because its visual value but it can be made into maple sugar, which enjoyed by people. In many different maple trees the most famous is sugar maple and black maple tree.</p><p>It is said that there are 7 percentage to 10 percentage in its sap, and products sugar for more than 50 years. So the "maple sugar festival of Canada" was born: the country regulated that every March when begin to collecting the maple sugar juice making maple sugar is the national traditional festival-- maple sugar festival. Among which, the people celebrated the festival very cheerly, tasting the sweet present that the nature gave. In order to improve the festival air, the farm that products the maple sugar brushed new, wearing the topdress and opened to the vistors for home and abroad. The custom of maple sugar festival--when the time comes, the farm which products maple sugar are burshed new, and wearing the festival topdress, all of them tasted the sweet present that the nature gave. The traditional maple sugar festival is opened to the vistors from home and abroad, especially to the children. Some farms still kept the implement of the Indian that are used to collect sap and make maple sugar before. At the festival they make the sugar with the old method, performing the course of making sugar, some of them provid maple sugar cake and "toffee" for the vistors free. At the festival the local residents performed different folk song and dance warmly, they brought the vistors to enjoy the luxuriant and beautiful maple red leaves.</p><p>The Canada is the country of maple leaves, the most famous was called "sugar maple", its sugar content reached to 3.5 percentage, which can be make into sweet "maple syrup", and "toffee". Every year between March and April, the "maple sugar festival" that was held once a year coming, these two provinces have the most vistors in the "country of maple leaf". During the maple sugar festival, some farms kept the implements that were used to collect sap and made maple sugar by Indian, with an ancient method, performing the art course of making sugar. The passionate Canadian acted the folk song and dance for the vistors, and provided maple sugar cake and toffee free. The "maple sugar festival" will last until June.</p><p>East from the Quebec along the St.Lawrence until the Niagara Falls to the west is the famous "maple tree road". In this 800 kilometres long road distributed thousands of sugar factories, which producted 32 thousand tons of maple sugar, whih take up more 80 percentage of the whole world. In Canada there are ten special kinds of maple trees in North Amrican, all of them provides sirup, the sugar maple and balck maple had the biggest output among them. The life of these two tress reach as long as 250 or 300 years, its trunk are as coarse as 90 centimeters and 30 metres high. The quantity of heat of maple sugar is lower than the fruit sugar and corn, and its calcium and magnesium are higher than anyother sugar, the calcium of maple sugar reached 10 percentage, which is the eaque of milk. collecting the maple sap is not hard. Punching some holes at the maple trees, inserting a plastic or metal pin, connecting plastic canal, the maple syrup will inpour into the storage dewars. It is said that the maple which had more than fifty years old are able to be collected maple syrup; Punching is not easy, its deepness can not exceed 75 millimeters, its diameter should less than 12 millimeters, and a little inclination to the upward. The next year you have to chang the new position to punch, the former hole can not be used; the juice every year extracted should at 10 percentage." all of these is in order to protect the maple trees, because the sap is just like the human blood, extracting too much or punching not carefully may hurt the trees."</p>

How To Match Pearl Jewelry In General Office And Sociabl

<p>The effects of jewelry is decorating, but if this decoration brings unhappiness to yourself and other people, beauty would be exist no more. Maybe we always do not know how we leave the bad impression to others. Thus, from now on, we should be more careful about various kinds of etiquettes and rules. GHD Hair Straighteners Trend You Should Not Forget</p><p>When you wear pearl jewelry, you have to consider those aspects, such as collar style, clothes colors, skin color, age, identity and occasion and so on, you need choose jewelry style which is coordinated with the environment. Though the pearl is beautiful, proper collocation can make jewelry and you all beautiful. To wear jewelry in work occasions, you should pay attention to th choice of taste and style. According to the color, style and other aspects of clothes, choose a simple tasteful jewelry is the way that won't make you regret. It is better for 25-year-old woman to choose smaller but exquisite pearl decoration sets. If we wear a piece of lavender pearl necklace of 3mm below our stand collar white blouse as well as a pair of earrings, we will leave a impression of mature, firm, reliable to our boss.How to Resume Your Most-Wanted ghd straighteners uk Everyday</p><p>Management women of high work level can choose good texture pearl jewelry with elegant color at the point view of showing taste. The jewelry can help you build the whole image of unassuming, full of intension, stand to sense, know how to live and easy to communicate. Look at the first lady ---- Hillary. Pearls are the ornaments she wears often on the lecture. In the past campaign speech, pearl is still her partner. Harmonious and decent career apparel with middle size and simple designed pearl jewellery make her a noble, graceful and amiable impression.</p><p>Social occasions offer you chances to show your excellent taste and personality. You can take this opportunity to let people know the other side of your personality.The pearls ornaments using on dinner party can be those which can highlight and show grace romantic atmosphere such as the pompous ornaments with big and outstanding pearls and diamonds. Actually, you can take advantage of pearls to display different feeling tone. On dinner parties, in order to fit the grandness of evening dresses, you need to choose natural pearl accessories with fantasy color effects. For necklaces, rings and earrings, color of grey with peacock green in could be considered. Big with multi-colored is a good choice, aubergine,gold and blue color are all the best companions for this style. The beauty who loves wearing jeans can choose the natural emerald green pearl necklace with blue layer to improve attraction. The irregular-length necklace can make you shape more uninhibited. Small but even pearls are also suitable. Meantime, you could choose makeup in grape, aubergine and rose violet colors to go with the pearl necklace. As for upload, it can be a tube or a deep color T-shirt with V collar. Let the fashion and pearls collide into a sexy with contradictory beauty. Most White-collars often wear white short-sleeved mini suit and knee-deep plaited skirt, so the office dress is usually plain with partial dark color. Therefore they can choose natural stratified pearls with brightness for pearl accessories. You could use two single-bead pearl necklace in different length, and wear thm one on top of another, to break the overly ordinary characteristic of white collars. Besides, pin a brooch with fantasy-colored effect on right forebreast or right collar. Although it is single-bead, it still feels rich.</p>

Attention, Chinese Fortune 500 Further Road

<p>In this year’s China’s Top-500 Enterprises list, many listed companies not only have good total income, some of their performance indicators also surpass those of some world and American Top-500 enterprises. How to Buy ghd straighteners uk There are a lot of comments on the market, many of which take the proportion promotion and pickup in sales as another saying of the promotion of the competitiveness . Polished GHD Hair Straighteners are Absolutely In Reign for July What’s more worrisome is that the performance of them will send us into an illusion. One Should Know the Reasons of the Popularity of GHD Straighteners </p><p>This year is a special period, the European counties and the United States are affected greatly by the financial crisis, our country is also affected, but it does not give us too much influence. At this point, the economic benefits between the enterprises, represting the impact of economic crisis and the strength between countries. Along with the western countries get recovery from the financial crisis, China’s Top-500 Enterprises still can not compete with the strong companies of developed countries.</p><p>It is known to all that the power based on efficiency is the real power, but how does efficiency come into being? The efficiency which is built up with the most great resources and forces of the country can only be an "isolated" incident. Many of our top 500 enterprises are built on such a basis at the cost of many small and medium-sized enterprises. The top five hundred enterprises built up in this way, due to lack of broad support from small and medium enterprises, are vulnerable to "sharp stop" strange phenomenon.</p><p>The author of The Post-American World had compared Zhen He’s Voyage to The Western Seas to Columbus’ discovery of the new world. Comparing to the then Europe’s voyage, Zhen He obviously had larger and more ships of better quality, in today’s terms, great and strong. Nevertheless, since the then China could manufacture perfect ships to conduct massive maritime explorations, why couldn’t they make matches? Why China had such a less benefit than Columbus’s expedition in such a strong maritime adventure, moreover, why had it stopped suddenly?</p><p>To the first question, the author’s answer is that Zhen He’s fleet was the same as the Forbidden City which was constructed by a similar national command system. Since the year 1406, there were more than one million laborers working on it, in addition another more than one million soldiers were supervising. A society’s whole energy and resources were put a limited numbers of works. Then the success of these constructions is only some “isolated” success.</p><p>As for the second question, the author's answer is: the task of Europeans sailing was smaller and more efficient; And often it is the cooperation between private and public, new products and new discoveries can be found in each sailing. While China’s navigations were decided by the interests and power of the emperor, and the official will pay for the money, regardless of cost; They do not value economic profits, and then the reaction line between companies, exploration, science and study did not exist.</p><p>All in all, technological innovation with Zheng He is based on the country’s centralized resources. Meaning that these technologies surpassed the then development level of economy and society to a extent that was difficult for the society to take advantage. Thus it can be seen that if China’s businesses keep on taking big as strong, and strong made by the whole nation as by themselves, they can never be self-independent and self-reliance.</p>

Stylish Jewellery Offers Joy As Well As Unhappiness To

<p>As to jewelry, many people only associate it with fashionable young women or the film star with splendid jewelry. 4 Things You Must Keep in Mind About ghd straighteners uk The market investors also keep groups on the young who have the stronger consuming capacity, few someone pays attention to need of the old. Attention! GHD Straighteners UK May Cause Injure to You</p><p>In fact, most seniors have changed their attitudes towards the pay for jewelry and begun to have requirements of pursuing fashion. GHD Straighteners In Stuttgart In the big stores, the fashionable jewelry is placed in a prominent position in the counters: such as irregular geometry, the complicated shape of flowers and stunning metallic luster. Old people do not exclude fashionable jewelry. A well groomed old person who is over sixty still likes to wear jewelry, especially the necklace, as the same as she was young. She thinks a piece of appropriate jewelry is really important for promoting the temperament of the old. She says she usually buys the necklaces, most ones are made of pearls and gold, and the styles are simple and traditional. She felt, now K gold, platinum and other jewelry popular in the jewelry market and occupy a large market share. They are designed in a fashion and novel way possibly because the consuming group they expect is the young. She never bought herself, but she likes stopping to appreciate before the counter in the shopping mall very much.</p><p>The viewpoint to fashion jewelry stands for plenty of senior consumers. However, only a few of them have tried jewelry that involves fashion elements. In views of this, fashionable jewelry indeed makes those elderly who love beauty both worried and happy.</p><p>Young people pay more attention to the craft and design of the jewelry while the old pay more attention to a kind of fashion which is both with function of keeping value and within people’s feelings. Rubies, sapphires and jade jewelry are often favored by the older, and some old "gentlemen" like wearing a white jade on a waist which appears to be both retro and fashionable. Importance should be attached to emotional connotation for jewelry designers and manufacturers as well as more digging up the special needs of the elderly.</p><p>Being a child, one can pick a proper style of jewelry as a birthday gift for the parents. It is believed that the jewelry as a birthday gift not only is fresh to the elderly, but also satisfies them. How many people will buy their parents an accessory symbolic for longevity in their sixtieth or seventieth?</p>

Skills In Keeping Jewelry New

<p>In order to make your jewelry bright as original, you should pay attention to a lot of aspects.Iâ€™ll Have What Eva Mendes Having: ghd straighteners uk </p><p>Don’t caress it frequently: It seems very easy to keep the jewelries clean as wearing, but difficult to make it. Attracted by the beauty and charm of jewelry, many people can’t help to touch it, which usually does great harm to the jewelry’s lustre and brightness Bodies of human excrete sweat and oil on the surface of skin anytime, hands is easiest to touch body parts, so the oil of skin often pollute the surface of hands. When the jewels are touched by the hands, the oil on the hands will stay on the jewels easily so that the shininess and brightness of the jewels are affected. Especially the diamond which is a kind of lipophilic stone, it is easily to strain with oiliness which will greatly effect on the lightness. While emerald belongs to aggregated structure which means that touch will make it more moist and pretty.Go!! Beauty all Adore ghd straighteners uk </p><p>Tap water hurts the brightness of pearl: some people want to clean pearl by tap water after they wear it for several times, it doesn’t matter if you clean it by tap water temporary. But you can not use running water to soak pearl, because running water contains fixed amount of chlorine, which will damage the luster of the pearls. Actually, the ideal water to soak pearls is mineral water. Besides, after you wear your pearl and before send it to bank and save, you should clean and maintenance it, in case the accumulated dirt makes pearl change color. But the conditions of bank safe deposit boxes is not suit to save pearl and other tide property stones, due to the low relative humidity, so you should take it out to soak and charge humidity every certainty time.</p><p>Timely taking them off is the maintenance: The right way of wearing the jewelry should frequently replace or take them off regarding as different peoples, times, places, and objects, but it may have no measure for busy modern people. But at least take jewelry off when you wash hands, because some soaps contain different certainty alkaline matters, after many days, this will hurt your weak jewelry. And the soap is also easy to store in the slits of ring, so this will influent the sheen and brightness of ring largely. And washing, doing housework, and swimming and so on, these will also easy to collision and hurt jewelry.</p><p>Pay attention to substances, which contain alkalinity and acidity: we touch some substances in daily life or food, which contain different concentrations of alkalinity and acidity. These different concentrations of acid and alkali chemicals may damage the gems, especially the pearls or other organic matter gems. Daily use of cosmetics should be avoided contaminating the jewelry.</p><p>Pay attention to the order of wearing the jewels: when you wear jewels with hooks, you should be careful they don’t strike your clothing and handbags. Usually, the order to wear jewels is to wear them after you wear your clothes. Think about this: wearing a claws stone ring, then putting on clothes and stockings, as to clothes, stockings and stones, is it a dangerous thing?</p><p>The smart usage of small jewelry bag: you may hear that the removed jewelry falls and damages unconsciously, or slide to water tank, or forget it on washbasin or other accidents when some people wash hands. In fact it is not fresh thing, but this crisis can be avoided. When you buy jewelry, there will be a small jewelry box presented to you in the store. The jewelry look beautiful when putting inside the box. In fact, the jewelry box has magical functions. It is small, taking little space and it is convenient to carry. When washing hands, you can take off the jewelry and put it in this box. If you get accustomed to that, the possibility of missing will decline. So, be sure to take these small boxes with you.</p>

Real-life Sleeping Beauty , Louisa Sleeps for a Week

<p>The relatives and friends of the British girl Louisa Powell call her "Sleeping Beauty", because she often keeps asleep for several days before waking up. It’s not because that Baur was bewitched by witches as what happened in fairy tales but that she suffers from “Kleine-Levin syndrome”, commonly called as “sleeping beauty syndrome”.How to Buy 70 Somethings the Perfect Gift for Consumer Right Day</p><p>Louisa, aged 15, who lives in Worthing, a southern city in the United Kingdom. She can sleep as long as a week without waking up sometimes even ten days. The 10th of British "Daily Mail", quoted the words of his father Richard, "To Wake her is hard, but we know we have to let her eat and drink." We have to let she eat and drink at once when we wake Louisa up, or she will fall asleep in a moment. Richard said, “she will also walk and talk as if she is somnambulating even if she is waken up. She will remember nothing after sleeping for a week or ten days.A-list GHD Straighteners are Absolutely Modish for December</p><p>Because of sleep, Louisa sometimes could not go to school and also missed some interesting holidays. Last year, while Louisa’s families were out for a week’s camping, she was sleeping all day along. “She woke up only to find that she had missed the whole vacation and got annoyed, but we could do nothing.” Richards said. Another time, Louisa slept on the airplane. After landing, her parents carried her off the plane after other passengers left, then held her in the car. Then she slept for 7 days after arriving home. In October 2008, Louisa caught a cold and then became a “Sleeping Beauty”. Sometimes, she even fell asleep in class. When she woke up,she was so hungry,quoting her parents words that its like she has been"hibernating". At first, Louisa treated at a local general hospital, but doctors could not find the reason. While she was diagnosed as "Periodic Sleepiness Gluttony Syndrome" in St. George Hospital in London. This syndrome is a rare disease, happened more commonly on young people and the symptoms usually disappear when they enter adulthood. Doctors had tried to use the medications to help raise excitement, but it didn't work for Louisa. The final diagnosis make her parents feel a little at ease. Although there is no good treatment for the moment, but gradually they know how to respond.</p><p>When she is awake, she loves to go to school and to learn dance. But because of this weird sickness, she has to miss dancing competetions and exams at school. Her parents feel worried that she may miss the examination of 'General Certificate of Secondary Education' in England. They should take this test after they finish their fisrt secondary education.</p><p>Louis receives a new treatment now, which looks good. Richards said: “She has not had somnolence for about seven weeks. We hope this can relieve her condition and lets her resume to normal life.”</p>

Men With Traditional Ideas Have Higher Level Of Payment

<p>People usually believe the females tend to be positioned lower at work and there also must be a difference between the males' salary and the females'. We generally consider the salary level for the same job, the male enjoy more than the femal. However, the impact of gender-role to pay can be much more than that simple. The latest phychology study shows that the male who has traditional concept own the higest level of salary. While in other gender, it is the women who support the idea of equality between men and women receives more payment than the traditional ones; however, the gap is not as obvious as that of the men.Youth Day Gift Ideas for Female</p><p>The study was published "Applied Psychology" magazine in the United States, Dr. Timothy Judge and other researchers from the University of Florida analyzed sample surveys-four interviews from 12,686 participants including men and women from 1979 to 2003. The researchers asked respondents of what is the view on gender roles in family workplace. They needed to answer questions, like "what do you think of the status of women in family", "will women's stepping out of family lead to more juvenile delinquency", "should women stay in home if the men are very successful" and so on. At the same time, these respondents also reported on their income status, religion, educational level, marital status and work experience.Suitable Tricks to Resume ghd uk </p><p>Having controlled a series of related factors, the researchers found that salary of those men who hold the view of traditional gender roles is 8,500 USD higher than those who don't hold such views. Women in Kraków all Like to Wear ghd straighteners uk As for this phenomenon, the researchers believe that today even in the promotion of gender equality environment, people who have traditional concepts also will try to maintain a balance between work and family. For women, the results were on the contrary, the average pay to female holding traditional gender role attitudes was 1,500 US dollars less than those without the traditional values. In other words, it can be expected that married couples who hold traditional gender role attitudes, their payment are more 7 times than couples with a gender equality attitude. And if one holds traditional attitudes of a man and a woman holding a gender equality, when combined, will create the highest family income.</p><p>The result also shows that the change in the ideas concerning gender roles will result in a change in salary, the more traditional a woman is, the greater loss will be in terms of payment, while the ideas of equality between the two genders will narrow the difference in payment between them. The research also found that respondents whose parents work outside show less the view of traditional gender roles, while those married and religious people will be prone to have traditional ideas. As for young people, they have less traditional gender roles concept, but the older they become, the more traditional concepts they have. Many people have realized the inequality of earning between men and women is more than an economic phenomenon. There is an important psychological mechanism at the back of it. The government try to make salary equality between men and women as their public policy goals, but the traditional gender roles ideas existed in people's mind will affect the long-term goal.</p>

<p>Global investor attention was focused on this piece of the Middle East hot spot when last Wednesday Dubai World announced the delay of debt payments. And it may impact the prospect of the financial recovery in Gulf that Dubai World declared the plan of restucturing.</p><p>It is shown in the report that, given that the debt risk exposure in Dubai region isn't entirely appear, the debt payment is still quite problematic. In the 184 billion US dollars' debt of UAE, Dubai claims 88 billion US dollars of it while Abu Dhabi shares amount of 90 billion US dollars. Bank of America Merrill Lynch says apart from the debt of 88 billion dollars this year, Dubai will still have debt due of 50 billion dollars in the future three years. It is estimated by the analysts that the total debt of Dubai is 26.5 billion of which 80 percent of money should be paid back in the next three years. However, the rate is 50 points higher than 3-month inter-bank rate of call in UAE.</p><p>Concerning the statement of central bank, John Sfakianakis, a economist in United Arab Emirates, said the move is to regain the confidence of investor and avoid the extended panic caused by crisis.
